strategist.name: Strategist
strategist.description: Master of battlefield control and enemy redirection.

uniqueAbility.name: Redirect Path
uniqueAbility.description: Generates a new path for enemies to follow

engineer.name: Engineer
engineer.description: Tower specialist focusing on enhancement and efficiency.

tactician.name: Tactician
tactician.description: Combat specialist with powerful offensive abilities.

uniqueAbility.name: Precision Strike
uniqueAbility.description: Deal 30% max health damage to all enemies on screen

mystic.name: Mystic
mystic.description: Manipulator of time and space with temporal abilities.

uniqueAbility.name: Time Warp
uniqueAbility.description: Slows all enemies by 50% for 8 seconds

uniqueAbility.name: Number Insight
uniqueAbility.description: Reveals 1 correct cell in the puzzle

architect.name: Architect
architect.description: Master builder who specializes in upgrading and reinforcing structures.

uniqueAbility.name: Fortify Grid
uniqueAbility.description: Upgrades 3 random existing towers by one level

oracle.name: Oracle
oracle.description: Seer who can glimpse the future flow of the battlefield.

uniqueAbility.name: Future Sight
uniqueAbility.description: Shows the next 3 waves of enemies

alchemist.name: Alchemist
alchemist.description: Master of transformation who can correct mistakes and turn weaknesses into strengths.

uniqueAbility.name: Transmutation
uniqueAbility.description: Converts an incorrect tower into a correct one

tinkerer.name: Tinkerer
tinkerer.description: Quick-thinking inventor who creates temporary solutions to immediate problems.

uniqueAbility.name: Rapid Deployment
uniqueAbility.description: Places 3 temporary towers at random valid positions

chronomancer.name: Chronomancer
chronomancer.description: Master of time who can momentarily halt the flow of battle.

uniqueAbility.name: Time Freeze
uniqueAbility.description: Completely pauses enemy movement for 5 seconds

gambler.name: Gambler
gambler.description: A risk-taker who thrives on luck and chaos.

uniqueAbility.name: Lucky Draw
uniqueAbility.description: Roll for a reward: gain 100 currency, gain 2 lives, or lose 1 life.

paladin.name: Paladin
paladin.description: A divine protector who restores hope in battle.

merchant.name: Merchant
merchant.description: A savvy trader who always finds a profit margin.

uniqueAbility.name: Sudoku Finisher
uniqueAbility.description: Completes any row, column, or 3x3 box missing only one number.

solver.name: Solver
solver.description: Applies logic to deduce safe placements without committing.

uniqueAbility.name: Hint Mode
uniqueAbility.description: Temporarily shows 3 suggested correct values in unused cells.

speedSolver.name: Speed Solver
speedSolver.description: Gains power from quickly solving sections of the puzzle.

uniqueAbility.name: Time Challenge
uniqueAbility.description: Start a 20-second challenge to solve cells. Each correct placement increases tower damage.

visualizer.name: Visualizer
visualizer.description: Uses pattern recognition to identify nearly completed sections.

uniqueAbility.name: Heat Vision
uniqueAbility.description: Highlights up to 3 rows, columns, or grids that are closest to completion.

beastmaster.name: Beastmaster
beastmaster.description: Summons a random beast that attacks enemies on the path.

uniqueAbility.name: Summon Beast
uniqueAbility.description: Summons a random beast (snail, goat, crocodile, or cat) to fight enemies

pyromancer.name: Pyromancer
pyromancer.description: Unleashes a wave of fire that burns enemies over time.

uniqueAbility.name: Fire Wave
uniqueAbility.description: Deals burn damage (5/sec for 5s) to all enemies.
